Title: Unintended Require in larvitbase-www
Description: All versions of `larvitbase-www` are vulnerable to an Unintended Require. The package exposes an API endpoint and passes a GET parameter unsanitized to an `require()` call. This allows attackers to execute any `.js` file in the same folder as the server is running. No fix is currently available. Consider using an alternative package until a fix is made available.
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
